edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.ui.panel

Enum PlayerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PlayerPanel>
      • edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.ui.panel.PlayerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetContainerable<JPanel>, GameStatusObserver, PlayerInfoObserver, Serializable, Comparable<PlayerPanel>

    public enum PlayerPanel
extends Enum<PlayerPanel>
implements GetContainerable<JPanel>, PlayerInfoObserver, GameStatusObserver
    Author:
    shenli

    An PlayerPanel object is used to create an "Player information" panel.

    The singleton PlayerPanel object contains a JPanel component. PlayerPanel object may be obtains by calls on edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.ui.factory.PanelFactory#getPanel(edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.game.ui.type.PanelType) factory methods. These will return the singleton PlayerPanel.

    Warning: Swing is not thread safe.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The singleton instance presents player panel swing.
